title: Baitou Ye Hou Zhi Jia Hou Zhuang Zhuang
synopsis: The patriarch of the white-headed langur, the spiritual leader in the big forest, came under the big banyan tree and announced that a new generation of "forest messengers" will be selected among the young people. Whoever obtains this title will shoulder the responsibility of protecting and managing this forest. Responsibilities. To become a real "forest messenger" can only be achieved through a series of competitions conducted by Elder Baimei. Zhuang Zhuang and macaques are eager to try with their dreams and fantasy. The story began in this competition for the title of "Forest Messenger". (translated from iqiyi)
